title: VTDigger reporter on Republican Liam Madden's 'paper donations' that helped launch his Congressional race
description: This hour, host Mikaela Lefrak speaks with political reporter Sarah Mearhoff about her reporting on campaign contributions to Republican nominee for Vermont's US House seat, Liam Madden.
